Package test.nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp6.Domain

Class DomainTestsThruMoves

java.lang.Object
test.nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp6.Domain.DomainTestsThruMoves
public class DomainTestsThruMoves extends Object
Tests that test the Domain package, through moving the player as as the user would.

  • Method Details

    • testHarnessValid

      public static void testHarnessValid(String input, String moves, String output)
      given a maze string as input, and another as output, and a sequence of moves, it checks wether after applying these moves on the input maze the a maze equivalent to the output maze is reached.
      Parameters:
      input - a string representing initial maze
      moves - a string representing sequence of moves
      output - a string representing expected final maze

    • testHarnessInvalid

      public static void testHarnessInvalid(String input, String moves, String output, Class<? extends Throwable> exception)
      tests if a given input and a given sequence of moves results in a generic exception, and a final maze equivalent to the input.(CURRENTLY NOT USED but kept due to intense usefulness)
      Parameters:
      input - a string representing initial maze
      moves - a string representing sequence of moves
      output - a string representing expected final maze
      exception - type of expected exception

    • makeTile

      public static Tile makeTile(char c, int x, int y)

      Parameters:
      c - the character to make a tile from
      x - co ord of tile
      y - co ord of tile

    • doMoves

      public static void doMoves(Domain domain, String sequence)
      does a sequence of moves on a given maze. moves are given as a string of characters (U, D, L, R) separated by space.
      Parameters:
      domain - used to do moves on
      sequence - of string of moves in format (L, U, R, D) separated by space or nothing

    • mazeParser

      public static Maze mazeParser(String maze)
      parses a specific format of string into a maze object.
      Parameters:
      maze - string format of the maze
      Returns:
      maze object extracted from this string
